description: From Spanish noria, from Arabic نَاعُورَة‎ (nāʕūra), from Classical Syriac ܢܥܘܪܬܐ‎ (nāʿōrtāʾ, “water wheel; growler”), from ܢܥܪ‎ (nʿar, “to roar, growl, bray”).

entries.meaning: A water wheel with attached buckets, used to raise and deposit water.
Any machine using buckets to raise water to an aqueduct.
